mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPING( NUM, NAME, CAMP_TYPE, THEMECODE, REG_KEYWORD, SUMMARY, IMGURL, OPTIONS, CONTENTS, POSTCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, ADDRESS4, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, CONTACT, REGDATE, REGID, MODDATE, READCOUNT, RECOMMEND, STEAMED, REVIEWCOUNT, STATUS ) VALUES( CAMPINGSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{camptype}, #{themecode}, #{regkeyword}, #{summary}, #{imgurl}, #{options}, #{contents}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{contact}, SYSDATE, #{regid}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0, '01' )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC, REGDATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, NUM,NAME,CAMP_TYPE,THEMECODE,REG_KEYWORD, SUMMARY,IMGURL,OPTIONS, POSTCODE,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,ADDRESS3,ADDRESS4, READCOUNT,RECOMMEND,STEAMED,REVIEWCOUNT, REGID,REGDATE,MODDATE, (CASE STATUS WHEN '01' THEN '노출' WHEN '02' THEN '비노출' END) AS STATUS FROM CAMPING WHERE 1=1
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND REGID = #{regid}
AND ADDRESS1 = #{address1}
AND ADDRESS2 = #{address2}
AND REGEXP_LIKE(CAMP_TYPE, #{camptype})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(THEMECODE, #{themecode})
AND REG_KEYWORD LIKE '%'|| #{regkeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%'
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
ORDER BY MODDATE DESC
ORDER BY READCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY RECOMMEND DESC
ORDER BY STEAMED DESC
ORDER BY REVIEWCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
SELECT NAME, CAMP_TYPE FROM CAMPING WHERE NUM = #{num}
SELECT REGID FROM CAMPING WHERE NUM = #{cnum}
